title: 1997년 Dumas 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Dumas. 판결일: 1997-03-26. 법원: District Court, S.D. New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES, INC., Et Ano., Plaintiffs, v. Jennifer DUMAS, Et Ano, Defendants
**판결일**: 1997-03-26
**법원**: District Court, S.D. New York
**관할**: New York, NY

**판사**: Kaplan

## 변호인

Kenneth P. Norwick, Norwick & Schad, New York City, for Plaintiffs., Roger L. Zissu, Lisa S. Pearson, Howard M. Rogatniek, Weiss Dawid Fross Zelnick & Lehrman, New York City, for Defendants.

## 인용

- 960 F. Supp. 710

## 판결문 요약


960 F. Supp. 710 (1997)
PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES, INC., et ano., Plaintiffs,
v.
Jennifer DUMAS, et ano, Defendants.
No. 91 Civil 6268(LAK).
United States District Court, S.D. New York.
March 26, 1997.
*711 *712 Kenneth P. Norwick, Norwick & Schad, New York City, for Plaintiffs.
Roger L. Zissu, Lisa S. Pearson, Howard M. Rogatnick, Weiss Dawid Fross Zelnick & Lehrman, New York City, for Defendants.

MEMORANDUM OPINION
KAPLAN, District Judge.
Many works of the late Patrick Nagel, a noted artist, were submitted to and appeared in Playboy. This case is a dispute between Nagel's widow and Playboy as to ownership of the copyrights in approximately 285 of these works.
The action began in September 1991, when plaintiffs Playboy Enterprises Inc., and Special Editions Ltd. (collectively "Playboy") sought a declaratory judgment that they are the owners of the copyrights. Defendants Jennifer Dumas and Jennifer Dumas, Inc. (collectively "Dumas"), Nagel's widow and the corporation to which Dumas assigned her copyrights, if any, in Nagel's works, opposed plaintiffs' claims and counterclaimed for infringement.
After a bench trial, the late Judge Tenney of this Court dismissed Playboy's claim for a declaratory judgment and granted judgment for defendants on their copyright infringement counterclaim. Playboy Enterprises, Inc. v. Dumas, 831 F. Supp. 295, 299 (S.D.N.Y.1993). The Second Circuit affirmed in part, reversed in part, and remanded to this Court for further findings on a number of ...
